articles.title: Airtel chief's comments on floor price validate Trai stance: Official - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: "The Cabinet-approved relief package is more important than seeking a floor price that may only be done in a scenario when the financial health of all telcos remain in bad shape," the official said. The telecom tariffs are currently under forbearance.
